file_insights.purpose: Define height constants and utilities for scout panel card virtualization

patterns_discovered: Systematic height calculation for different card types
Separation of card height and item height calculations
gotchas_discovered: Height constants may need updates if styling changes
Expandable cards require separate base and expanded height calculations

approach_outcome.primary_goal: Audit scout card heights for efficient virtualization

recommendations: Regularly review height constants if design changes
Use getScoutCardHeight for dynamic height calculations
Consider adding runtime measurements as a fallback
